issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
ALOY: Bottons are not displayed using the proxy properties.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Run the following app as test/apps/ui/proxy_properties/' from the alloy repository.

Expected:
Custom title is displayed (set with TitleControl) with two custom buttons.

Actual:
No buttons are displayed.
fields.summary: ALOY: Bottons are not displayed using the proxy properties.
fields.environment:
Tested on:
Device: Google Nexus 4, android: 4.0.4
Device: Google Nexus 7 Tab, android version: 4.1
Linux version : 3.5.0-23-generic (Ubuntu/Linaro 4.6.3-1ubuntu5)
SDK: 3.1.1.v20130603173057
Titanium Studio, build: 3.1.1.201306031944

comments.body: If you go to the documentation for these proxy properties, for example [Ti.UI.Window|http://docs.appcelerator.com/titanium/latest/#!/api/Titanium.UI.Window], you'll find that these properties are not supported on Android, explaining the behavior you are seeing.
